title: What are the pros and cons of having a biweekly salary payment system? - Quora

response.answer_text: Pros and cons of having a biweekly salary payment system? Pros: You don’t have to wait for an entire month for your salary.You can go to pubs, discos, multiplexes every week.You don't need to worry regarding the saving of money for month end expenses.You don't have to do long monthly bill calculations.Cons: You will not be able to save money as you will always think of saving the money from your next fortnight payment.You will have to pay the monthly electric, water and other maintenance bills from your alternate fortnight salary.You will start loosing the power of planning and implementing.You cannot buy any expensive things at a time as you will be receiving fortnight payment instead of monthly payment.
